${ModID}:BackToBasicsQuest.TITLE: Keep it Simple
${ModID}:BackToBasicsQuest.DESCRIPTION: Defeat an Elite or Boss without playing uncommon or rare cards.

${ModID}:BackToBasicsQuest.REWARD: Upgrade three random starter or common cards.
TRACKER_TEXT: Defeat an Elite or Boss without playing uncommon or rare cards.

${ModID}:UnbreakableQuest.TITLE: Unbreakable
${ModID}:UnbreakableQuest.DESCRIPTION: Take damage equal to your base Max HP within #b17 floors.

${ModID}:KeyCollector.TITLE: Key Collector
${ModID}:KeyCollector.DESCRIPTION: Collect the Ruby, Emerald, and Sapphire keys by the end of the act.
